mapper.sql: SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ , B.BOARD_TYPE , C.NAME AS BOARD_TYPE_NAME , B.SUPER_BOARD_SEQ , B.TAB_CNT , B.WRITER , M.NAME AS WRITER_NAME , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE FROM BOARD B, COMM_CODE C, MEMBER M WHERE M.ID = B.WRITER AND B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CODE AND C.CODE = #{ boardType } AND C.CODE_ID = 200
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{ boardType }
